farmerSchemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
farmerSchemes.description: Provides income support of â‚¹6,000 per year to small and marginal farmers.
farmerSchemes.beneficiaries: Small and marginal farmers owning up to 2 hectares of land.

farmerSchemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
farmerSchemes.description: Crop insurance scheme to provide financial support to farmers in case of crop loss due to natural calamities.
farmerSchemes.beneficiaries: Farmers who enroll in the scheme.

farmerSchemes.name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
farmerSchemes.description: Provides short-term credit to farmers to meet their agricultural needs.
farmerSchemes.beneficiaries: All farmers including tenant farmers and sharecroppers.

farmerSchemes.name: Soil Health Card Scheme
farmerSchemes.description: Provides soil health cards to farmers with crop-wise recommendations.

farmerSchemes.name: PM Kusum Scheme
farmerSchemes.description: Promotes the use of solar energy in irrigation by subsidizing solar-powered pumps.

farmerSchemes.name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY)
farmerSchemes.description: Encourages states to increase investment in agriculture.

farmerSchemes.name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)
farmerSchemes.description: Promotes organic farming in clusters.

farmerSchemes.name: National Agriculture Market (e-NAM)
farmerSchemes.description: Provides an online trading platform for agricultural commodities.

farmerSchemes.name: Mukhya Mantri Krishi Ashirwad Yojana
farmerSchemes.description: Provides financial assistance to farmers in Jharkhand.
farmerSchemes.beneficiaries: Small and marginal farmers in Jharkhand.

farmerSchemes.name: Rythu Bandhu Scheme
farmerSchemes.description: Provides financial assistance to farmers for crop investment in Telangana.
farmerSchemes.beneficiaries: Farmers owning agricultural land in Telangana.

farmerSchemes.name: Krishak Bandhu Scheme
farmerSchemes.description: Provides financial support and life insurance to farmers in West Bengal.

farmerSchemes.name: Biju Krushak Kalyan Yojana (BKKY)
farmerSchemes.description: Provides health insurance coverage to farmers in Odisha.
farmerSchemes.beneficiaries: Farmers and their families in Odisha.

farmerSchemes.name: Yuva Sahakar Scheme
farmerSchemes.description: Encourages youth participation in agricultural cooperatives.

farmerSchemes.name: Chief Minister's Solar Agriculture Feeder Scheme
farmerSchemes.description: Provides solar-powered irrigation pumps in Maharashtra.

farmerSchemes.name: Balram Tal Yojana
farmerSchemes.description: Encourages construction of farm ponds in Chhattisgarh.

farmerSchemes.name: Jai Kisan Rin Mukti Yojana
farmerSchemes.description: Offers loan waiver for farmers in Madhya Pradesh.
farmerSchemes.beneficiaries: Farmers with outstanding loans in Madhya Pradesh.

farmerSchemes.name: Uzhavar Santhai
farmerSchemes.description: Establishes farmer markets in Tamil Nadu to ensure fair prices.
farmerSchemes.beneficiaries: Farmers and consumers in Tamil Nadu.

farmerSchemes.name: Mukhya Mantri Krishi Yantrikaran Yojana
farmerSchemes.description: Provides subsidies for farm equipment in Bihar.

farmerSchemes.name: Har Khet Ko Pani
farmerSchemes.description: Ensures water availability for every farm under the PMKSY scheme.

farmerSchemes.name: Saur Sinchai Yojana
farmerSchemes.description: Subsidizes solar pumps for irrigation in Gujarat.
